testimonials.firstTestimonial: “I enjoy every moment at yoga balance so much. It makes me feel younger and more living. I highly recommend this for every woman in menopause!”
testimonials.secondTestimonial: “I cannot live without my yoga classes at YogaBalance, it helps me find peace in mind and body.”

text: Here at YogaBalance, we provide a tranquil environment for your yoga journey.

translatePage.heading: Welcome to YogaBalance
translatePage.sub-heading: Join our classes and find your inner peace

membership.subHeader: Get the most out of your yoga practice

allInclusive.title: All inclusive
allInclusive.description: Go to all of our classes and courses and also participate in our retreats. You get personal help from our instructors to plan your classes based on your goals. This is for you who will fully commit to living your full potential during menopause and beyond.

yogaMember.title: Yoga member
yogaMember.description: Participate in all classes. This membership also includes one hour consultation with an instructor each month.

header.title: Yoga and meditation for women
header.subtitle: We help you stay vigorous in mind & body during menopause

courses.subHeader: Our courses are designed for improved health during and after menopause

course1.description: Using yoga and meditation on a daily basis to improve your body and mind. Prepare to meet new experiences with renewed strength, with soft movements.
course1.details: 8 weeks Sensing Yoga and meditation practice, includes videos and live classes, starting on 26/10, price 3400 SEK
course1.altText: Woman sitting on a mat in a yoga position.

course2.description: Meditation can help you reduce stress, sleep better, and really get the recovery you need. It also helps you listen to your emotions and body to know when it’s time to slow down.
course2.details: 10 weeks of meditation practice, includes videos and live classes, starting on 23/11, price 4300 SEK
course2.altText: Closeup of woman in a meditation position.

course3.description: Yin yoga course. Learn to relax and stretch your body with slow movements and static positions. Stress reducing and it helps you strengthen your mental health.
course3.details: 8 weeks of Yin Yoga, includes videos and live classes, starting on 6/12, price 3400 SEK
course3.altText: Above perspective picture of a woman with locked hands.
